pages.text: 初涉$(6)血魔法$()，你需要搜集少量的$(item)恶魔意志$()。有两种获取途径：$(br)$(li)击杀被网困住的怪物，被网住的怪物身上会冒出白色的粒子效果。$(li)使用$(l:demonwill/sentientsword)$(item)感知之剑$(/l)$()击杀敌对怪物。$(br)考虑到你刚刚开始游玩本模组，你应该还没有$(l:demonwill/sentientsword)$(item)感知之剑$(/l)，因此你需要使用

$(l:demonwill/soulsnare)$(item)灵魂投网$(/l)。$(br2)Demon Will is a recurring resource in $(6)Blood Magic$() that is used in crafting for several advanced blocks, such as the $(l:demonwill/soulforge)$(item)Hellfire Forge,$(/l) as well as items like the $(l:demonwill/sentientsword)$(item)Sentient Sword.$(/l)$(br2)In the lore of $(6)Blood Magic$(), $(1)Demon Will$() is the residual effect of when a demon imbues its will into the bodies of the dead.

Once you have some Will, you can use it to craft useful tools in the $(item)Hellfire Forge$(). Also, it is suggested to gather two $(item)Demon Will$() items before coming back to base, since you need to have one in order to craft your first $(l:altar/bloodaltar)Blood Altar.$(/l)
